channel.title: Animal Planet's "Whale Wars"
channel.description:
If you have ever seen this series, discuss the reasons between both parties.
Small info:
Japanese POV [hr] The catching and slaughtering and packaging and "research" of (endangered) whale.
USA POV [hr] The stopping of catching and slaughtering and packaging and "research" of (endangered) whale. Under the guard of the international law that stops commercial trade of said (endangered) whale.

item.title: Animal Planet's "Whale Wars"

oh, just to add on I toured the Arctic Sunrise the other day!

item.title: Animal Planet's "Whale Wars"
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:2, topic:359057”]I respect Paul Watson and Sea Shepard very much, but I think Greenpeace conveys their message of helping the environment so much more.

Sea Shepard only uses its fame in the Arctic, but doesn’t help the planet much more then saving some whales.[/quote]
Exactley

Read full topic
